docs.snippet: CHESTER, Pa., April 12 -- The new liner Rio de Janeiro was sent down the ways here today and hailed by distinguished guests representing the United States and Brazil as being symbolic of a growing understanding and solidarity between the nations of...
docs.lead_paragraph: CHESTER, Pa., April 12 -- The new liner Rio de Janeiro was sent down the ways here today and hailed by distinguished guests representing the United States and Brazil as being symbolic of a growing understanding and solidarity between the nations of the Western Hemisphere.

docs.snippet: THE collection of Contemporary Art of the Western Hemisphere, assembled by the International Business Machines Corporation, has been invited for exhibition at leading Pan-American museums. It will leave on May 9 for South America, the first showing...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE collection of Contemporary Art of the Western Hemisphere, assembled by the International Business Machines Corporation, has been invited for exhibition at leading Pan-American museums. It will leave on May 9 for South America, the first showing of the paintings to take place at the National Museum of Fine Arts in Rio de Janeiro in June.

docs.snippet: In one Latin-American capital after another the prevailing attitude is this: The war is not yet over and the Axis may come out on top. Walk softly, take it easy, wait and see. It is no surprise, therefore, that relatively few American republics have...
docs.lead_paragraph: In one Latin-American capital after another the prevailing attitude is this: The war is not yet over and the Axis may come out on top. Walk softly, take it easy, wait and see. It is no surprise, therefore, that relatively few American republics have been willing to follow the lead of the United States and take over German and Italian vessels tied up in their harbors.

docs.snippet: Formal awards in the Latin American Prize Novel contest were made at a dinner at the Waldorf-Astoria Hotel last night at which a letter from Secretary of State Cordell Hull was read hailing cultural interchange among the Americas as a means of...
docs.lead_paragraph: Formal awards in the Latin American Prize Novel contest were made at a dinner at the Waldorf-Astoria Hotel last night at which a letter from Secretary of State Cordell Hull was read hailing cultural interchange among the Americas as a means of strengthening "the friendship which so happily prevails today."

docs.snippet: ASUNCION, Paraguay, April 18 -- The Ministry of Internal Affairs announced today that the government had blocked an attempted coup d'etat and that "with the full support of the army and public opinion" it had the situation completely in hand and that...
docs.lead_paragraph: ASUNCION, Paraguay, April 18 -- The Ministry of Internal Affairs announced today that the government had blocked an attempted coup d'etat and that "with the full support of the army and public opinion" it had the situation completely in hand and that calm reigned throughout the country.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 19 -- Foreign Minister Alberto Guani today addressed a note to all the American republics explaining the purpose and scope of his proposal that the Pan-American Financial and Economic Committee in Washington examine the...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 19 -- Foreign Minister Alberto Guani today addressed a note to all the American republics explaining the purpose and scope of his proposal that the Pan-American Financial and Economic Committee in Washington examine the legal aspects of seizure by neutrals of ships belonging to belligerent powers.
docs.abstract: Uruguayan Min Guani defends proposal that Pan Amer Financial and Econ Com examine legal aspects of seizure

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: A steady decline in the free pound sterling, which carried that bill down to $4.00 1/4, lowest since last August, and an equally brisk reaction in the Swiss franc, which sold at 23.16 1/2 cents, cheapest since last October, represented the only...
docs.lead_paragraph: A steady decline in the free pound sterling, which carried that bill down to $4.00 1/4, lowest since last August, and an equally brisk reaction in the Swiss franc, which sold at 23.16 1/2 cents, cheapest since last October, represented the only diversions of an otherwise colorless market in the foreign exchanges last week.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; WEEK ENDED APRIL 19, 1941
